trait.name: Minion
entries: If the creature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, its hit points are reduced to 0. If the creature takes damage from another effect, it dies if the damage equals or exceeds its hit point maximum, otherwise it takes no damage.

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: A creature that starts its turn grappling the hamatula or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

trait.name: Paranoid
entries: The hamatula cannot be surprised.

action.name: Crash of Barbs (Group Attack)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 piercing damage.
If three or more hamatula contributed to this attack, the target additionally becomes grappled by one of them (escape DC 15).

action.name: Ooze Terror
entries: The hamatula secretes a volatile hallucinogenic oil from its barbs. Until the beginning of the hamatula's next turn, creatures within 5 feet of it have disadvantage on saving throws against being frightened or poisoned.

name: Hamatula Factorum
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: A creature that starts its turn grappling the hamatula or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

trait.name: Paranoiac Resistance
entries: The hamatula has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, except for those against being frightened.
Additionally, the hamatula cannot be surprised.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hamatula makes three attacks with its Thorntip Claws or uses its Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Thorntip Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.
Instead of dealing damage, the hamatula can grapple the target (escape DC 14).

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell Attack. +5 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) fire damage. On a critical hit, the target begins burning (1d10).

action.name: Impaler's Embrace
entries: The hamatula extends its spines deeper into a creature grappled by it, forcing it to make a DC 14 Strength saving throw.
On a failure, the target takes 28 (8d6) piercing damage and is restrained until the beginning of the hamatula's next turn, or takes half as much damage and escapes the grapple on a success.

reaction.name: Burltail Lash
entries: When a creature enters the hamatula's reach, it can force the creature to succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) piercing damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away.

name: Hamatula Reave-Shrike
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: A creature that starts its turn grappling the hamatula or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

trait.name: Paranoiac Resistance
entries: The hamatula has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, except for those against being frightened.
Additionally, the hamatula cannot be surprised.

trait.name: Hamatula Exemplar
entries: Other hamatulas within 30 feet of the reave-shrike can use its saving throw bonuses in place of their own.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hamatula makes three attacks with its Wicked Hook-Axe, one of which it can replace with a use of its Sickening Exhaust or Impaler's Embrace, or it uses its Hurl Flame three times.

action.name: Wicked Hook-Axe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
A creature hit for the second time in a turn with this attack in a turn is grappled (escape DC 15).

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: Ranged Spell Attack. +6 to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (4d6) fire damage. On a critical hit, the target begins burning (1d10).

action.name: Sickening Exhaust (3rd Level Spell, Concentration)
entries: The hamatula calls forth a foul plume of smoke within a creature it can see within 60 feet, forcing it to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for the next minute (save ends at end of turn).
Whenever the poisoned creature speaks or casts a spell with a verbal component for the first time on a turn, it takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and is blinded until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Impaler's Embrace
entries: The hamatula extends its spines deeper into a creature grappled by it, forcing it to make a DC 15 Strength saving throw.
On a failure, the target takes 28 (8d6) piercing damage and is restrained until the beginning of the hamatula's next turn, or takes half as much damage and escapes the grapple on a success.

action.name: Debt-Brethren Call (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The hamatula summons 5 (2d4) Hamatula Trawlers to unoccupied spaces it can see within 60 feet.
After 1 minute, the summoned hamatula are banished to whence they came, their debt repaid.

reaction.name: Burltail Lash
entries: When a creature enters the hamatula's reach, it can force the creature to succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or take 7 (2d6) piercing damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away.

reaction.name: Spellfire Combustion (2nd Level Spell)
entries: When the hamatula is affected by a spell that targets an area, it can make an Intelligence (Arcana) check against the spellcaster's spell save DC.
On a success, any damage dealt by the spell becomes fire damage.

legendary.name: Claim Spoils
entries: The hamatula moves up to half its speed and can grasp at a magic item held by a creature within 5 feet, forcing it to succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or have the item wrenched from its grasp.
A creature that isn't grappled or restrained has advantage on this saving throw.

legendary.name: Infernal Exhortation (2nd Level Spell, Concentration)
entries: Fire wreaths a friendly devil of CR lower than the hamatula's that it can see within 30 feet.
The target's melee attacks have advantage and deal an additional 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit.

legendary.name: Restless Vigil
entries: The hamatula moves up to half its speed and can make a Wisdom (Perception) check.
Until the beginning of its next turn, attacks against the hamatula treat half cover as three-quarters cover.

name: Orthon Chaosbreaker
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orthon makes two attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of its Thunder Pot.

action.name: Hellcarver Poleaxe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) slashing damage.
If this attack exceeded the target's AC by 5 or more, the orthon can immediately make a second attack against another creature in its reach.

action.name: Brazen Arbalest
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:

items.name: Anchor Bolt
items.entry: The target can't teleport for the next minute.

items.name: Beacon Bolt
items.entry: The next attack the orthon makes against the target this turn has advantage.

items.name: Disruption Bolt
items.entry: One magical effect on the target is suppressed for it for the next minute.

action.name: Thunder Pot
entries: The orthon tosses a brass explosive to a space it can see within 30 feet. At the beginning of each creature's turn, roll a d4.
On roll of 1, the pot explodes, forcing each creature within 10 feet of it to succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) thunder damage, or half as much on a success.

name: Orthon Executioner
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orthon makes two attacks.

action.name: Guillotine Greatknife
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage.
Any hit with this attack against a target that can't see the orthon becomes a critical.

action.name: Brazen Arbalest
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:

items.name: Anchor Bolt
items.entry: The target can't teleport for the next minute.

items.name: Charged Bolt
items.entry: The target takes an additional 11 (2d10) lighting damage.

items.name: Disruption Bolt
items.entry: One magical effect on the target is suppressed for it for the next minute.

bonus.name: Thunder Pot
entries: The orthon tosses a brass explosive to a space it can see within 30 feet. At the beginning of each creature's turn, roll a d4.
On roll of 1, the pot explodes, forcing each creature within 10 feet of it to succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) thunder damage, or half as much on a success.

bonus.name: Unseen Shroud (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The orthon becomes Invisible until it takes any hostile action or takes 10 or more damage from a single source.

name: Orthon Skullkeeper
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The orthon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Shatterbolt Tracker
entries: The orthon can magically detect the direction and distance of each creature on the same plane of existence it has hit with a ranged attack in the last 24 hours.

trait.name: Delayed Onset (Concentration)
entries: If the orthon fails a saving throw against an effect that would incapacitate it, it can choose not to be incapacitated by that effect for as long as it maintains concentration.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The orthon makes two attacks, one of which can be with its Profaner's Siege Hammer.

action.name: Profaner's Siege Hammer
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
If this attack had advantage, the target must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Brutal Kick
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage and the orthon can push the target up to 10 feet away.
This attack does an additional 9 (2d8) damage to a prone target.

action.name: Brazen Arbalest
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d10 + 3) piercing damage, plus one of the following effects:

items.name: Anchor Bolt
items.entry: The target can't teleport for the next minute.

items.name: Disruption Bolt
items.entry: One magical effect on the target is suppressed for it for the next minute.

items.name: Flashblind Bolt
items.entry: The target is blinded until the beginning of its next turn.

action.name: Hellfire Torrent
entries: The orthon spews a stream of hellfire in a 30 foot line from its arbalest, forcing each creature in the area to succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 22 (4d10) fire damage.
This damage ignores resistance to fire damage, and treats immunity to fire damage as resistance.

action.name: Infernal Escape (1/Day, 7th Level Spell)
entries: The orthon tears open a searing pathway to the hells, teleporting there along with up to one willing or unconscious creature within 5 feet.
Each creature within 20 feet of the space it departed must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (4d6) fire damage, or half as much on a success.

bonus.name: Thunder Pot
entries: The orthon tosses a brass explosive to a space it can see within 30 feet. At the beginning of each creature's turn, roll a d4.
On roll of 1, the pot explodes, forcing each creature within 10 feet of it to succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (3d8) thunder damage, or half as much on a success.

bonus.name: Unseen Shroud (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The orthon becomes Invisible until it takes any hostile action or takes 10 or more damage from a single source.

legendary.name: Furtive Thunder
entries: The orthon uses its Thunder Pot or detonates an explosive thrown by it, then can move up to half its speed.
If the orthon is Invisible or Hidden, this action does not break its Invisibility or reveal its position.

legendary.name: Hobnail Stomp
entries: The orthon moves up to half its speed, then can make an attack with its Brutal Kick against a prone target.

legendary.name: Firing Position (5th Level Spell, Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The orthon teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet, then can make up to two attacks with its Brazen Arbalest.

name: Osyluth Monitor
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Keeper of Compliance
entries: When the osyluth deals damage to a friendly creature, each other devil within 30 feet of the osyluth that can see it gains advantage on the first attack or Wisdom saving throw it makes before the beginning of the osyluth's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The osyluth makes three attacks, two of which can be with its Dripping Stingblade.

action.name: Needlebone Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage plus one of the following effects:

items: The target must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
If the target is grappled, it takes an additional 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

action.name: Dripping Stingblade
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage.
A creature missed with this attack can use its reaction to make an opportunity attack against the osyluth.

reaction.name: Punish Resistance
entries: When a creature fails an attempt to escape the osyluth's grapple, the osyluth can make a Dripping Stingblade attack against it.

name: Osyluth Inquisitor
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Keeper of Compliance
entries: When the osyluth deals damage to a friendly creature, each other devil within 30 feet of the osyluth that can see it gains advantage on the first attack or Wisdom saving throw it makes before the beginning of the osyluth's next turn.

trait.name: Diabolical Mastery (1/Day)
entries: When the osyluth would fail a saving throw, it can choose to succeed. If it does, one friendly devil within 30 feet loses 25 hit points. If a devil is killed in this way, the osyluth immediately regains a use of this ability.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The osyluth makes three attacks, two of which can be with its Dripping Stingblade, or makes one attack and uses its Osseous Bonds or Inquisition of Vice.

action.name: Needlebone Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage plus one of the following effects:

items: The target must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
If the target is grappled, it takes an additional 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

action.name: Dripping Stingblade
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage.
A creature missed with this attack can use its reaction to make an opportunity attack against the osyluth.

action.name: Osseous Bonds (2nd Level Spell)
entries: The osyluth touches a creature within 10 feet and a layer of bone begins to encase the target's body, forcing it to succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or gain 20 temporary hit points.
While the creature has any of these temporary hit points, it is blinded, restrained, choking, and its AC becomes 20, unless it was already higher.

action.name: Inquisition of Vice (4th Level Spell)
entries: The osyluth attempts to tear forth secrets from the mind of a frightened creature within 5 feet, forcing it to make a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw.
On a failure, the target takes 35 (10d6) psychic damage and the osyluth learns whichever secret the target most wants to conceal from it.
On a success, the target takes half as much damage and can choose what information the osyluth learns.

action.name: Hellfire Castigation (Recharge 5-6, 6th Level Spell, Concentration)
entries: The osyluth fills a creature it can see within 60 feet with the unquenched fires of Phlegethos, forcing it to succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or take 27 (5d10) fire damage and be cursed.
The cursed creature is charmed by the osyluth and takes 27 (5d10) fire damage the first time each turn that it disobeys one of the osyluth's commands.
Damage dealt by this spell ignores resistance to fire damage, and treats immunity to fire damage as resistance.

reaction.name: Punish Resistance
entries: When a creature fails an attempt to escape the osyluth's grapple, the osyluth can make a Dripping Stingblade attack against it.

legendary.name: Confiscate Contraband
entries: The osyluth forces a grappled creature within 10 feet of it to succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or have one item it is carrying stolen by the osyluth.
If the item requires attunement, the osyluth can use that item as though it were attuned to it for the next hour.

legendary.name: Crush Resolve
entries: One creature grappled by the osyluth must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened and restrained for as long as it remains grappled.

legendary.name: Disciplinary Brutality
entries: The osyluth moves up to half its speed and makes an attack with its Needlebone Claws.
If this attack kills a friendly devil, up to two other friendly devils within 30 feet can each use their reactions to make a melee attack.
